title: Sandstone Slab
summaries: Sandstone Slab is a building material which is similar in appearance to Sandstone Bricks, but darker and larger. Unlike most other building blocks (Stone Slabs in particular), the Sandstone Slab does not have a wall counterpart.
As Sand is affected by gravity, Sandstone Slabs can be used instead of sand when building sand-related structures, as they look almost identical.
